Detailed Description

cpsw nimu implementation for AMxxx SOCs

Typedef Documentation

typedef struct CPSW_EMAC_DATA_s CPSW_EMAC_DATA

CPSW_EMAC_DATA.

The structure is used to store the private data for the EMAC controller.
